stories.title: Goodbye Posts Leaving Facebook Engineering in 2016; China, User Content and E2EE
Lemurs sing in a rhythm previously only found in humans and birds

stories.text:
I'm shocked about latest revelations on Google (and Facebook, ...) power to shape the world and I need help understanding how we've got to this point (and possibly the way out).

I feel everything sound so complicated while it could be easily understood with the help of somebody like Noam Chomsky writing on IT and geopolitics.

Any suggestion on what to read?
stories.title: The Noam Chomsky of IT
Can UNESCO status save the worldâ€™s oldest mummies?
Google: Trusting a website is a philosophical question
A Love Letter to Ruby and Rails
Chinese Citizen Journalist Who Documented Covid-19 in Wuhan Resurfaces
Argon Fluoride Laser Could Lead to Practical Fusion Reactors

stories.text: Finding a primary care physician is one of the most challenging things a "normal" adult has to deal with these days. They are supposed to get to know you as an individual and be a central point of care, but these days they often don't have time to do anything like that. So, what are normal people to do?
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you find a doctor in the USA?
